mapper.select: select un_consume_message_num as unConsumeMessageNum, publish_message_num as publishMessageNum, deliver_message_num as deliverMessageNum,worktime from skytrain_queue_message_info_history where queue_name = #{queueName} and worktime between #{startTime} and #{endTime}

select sum(publish_message_num) as publishMessageNumSum ,sum(deliver_message_num) as deliverMessageNumSum, date_format(worktime,'%Y-%m-%d %H') as realtime from skytrain_queue_message_info_history where queue_name = #{queueName} and worktime between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by date_format(worktime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00')

select sum(publish_message_num) as publishMessageNumSum ,sum(deliver_message_num) as deliverMessageNumSum, date_format(worktime,'%Y-%m-%d') as realtime from skytrain_queue_message_info_history where queue_name = #{queueName} and worktime between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by date_format(worktime,'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')
